Reviews.Title: Impressed !!!!!
Reviews.Author: William Franz
Reviews.Content: This was my first stepp out side the point and shot arena. Allways loved taking pictures and when my old camera busted down in Big Bend a couple of years ago I purchased a Nikon cool pic 120 and the bug bit hard.Still playing with all the gadgets and getting used to it, but positive that this was the right choice for me. The price on the bundle was great and all arrived on time and intact without a hitch !!!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Bronze) + <2> Nikon 55-300mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Samyang 500mm Telephoto Lens +
<4> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card + <5> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <6> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <7> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control +
<8> Rokinon 67" Monopod & Case + <9> PD Laptop/Tablet DSLR Backpack + <10> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<12> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <13> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <14> T Mount for Nikon + <15> Instruction Sheet for T-Mount
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Bronze) with 55-300mm VR + 500mm Telephoto Lens + 32GB Card + Backpack + Tele/Wide Lenses + Monopod + Accessory Kit
